findings.details: Skip link was rendered in layout and also injected via JS, creating duplicate focus targets.
Responsive helpers and mobile image styles are present in custom.css.
Links were scanned via rg; no obvious placeholder domains found. Network validation not executed in this run.
Pages and recent posts include description/keywords; default layout includes seo tag and theme-color.
Daily news posts updated and include descriptive summaries with thumbnails.
theme.js was duplicating skip link injection; removing it reduces DOM operations on load.

recommendations: Remove duplicate skip link injection from theme.js
Keep audit note about manual-only link check due to restricted network
